alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Elko County through 315 PM PDT... At 244 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pequop Summit, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Elko County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
